org.mxupdate.eclipse.properties
Enum ProjectMode

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ProjectMode>
      org.mxupdate.eclipse.properties.ProjectMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ProjectMode>
public enum ProjectMode
extends Enum<ProjectMode>

Enumeration to differ the modes of projects.

Version:
$Id: ProjectMode.java 774 2010-03-29 00:27:04Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

Enum Constant Summary
MXUPDATE_SSH_MQL
          MxUpdate Plug-In uses MQL on a SSH server.
MXUPDATE_SSH_MQL_WITH_PROPERTY_FILE
          MxUpdate Plug-In uses MQL on a SSH server and the properties are stored in an external property file.
MXUPDATE_VIA_URL
          Classic, MXUpdate Eclipse Plug-In connects via URL or via shared library.
MXUPDATE_VIA_URL_WITH_PROPERTY_FILE
          Classic with external definition, means that the settings for the MX connection are defined in a property file.
MXUPDATE_WITH_PROPERTY_FILE
          MxUpdapte connection where all values are stored in external property file.
UNKNOWN
          The mode is now defined and unknown.

Enum Constant Detail

UNKNOWN

public static final ProjectMode UNKNOWN
The mode is now defined and unknown.

MXUPDATE_VIA_URL

public static final ProjectMode MXUPDATE_VIA_URL
Classic, MXUpdate Eclipse Plug-In connects via URL or via shared library.

MXUPDATE_VIA_URL_WITH_PROPERTY_FILE

public static final ProjectMode MXUPDATE_VIA_URL_WITH_PROPERTY_FILE
Classic with external definition, means that the settings for the MX connection are defined in a property file.

public static final ProjectMode MXUPDATE_SSH_MQL
MxUpdate Plug-In uses MQL on a SSH server.

MXUPDATE_SSH_MQL_WITH_PROPERTY_FILE

public static final ProjectMode MXUPDATE_SSH_MQL_WITH_PROPERTY_FILE
MxUpdate Plug-In uses MQL on a SSH server and the properties are stored in an external property file.

MXUPDATE_WITH_PROPERTY_FILE

public static final ProjectMode MXUPDATE_WITH_PROPERTY_FILE
MxUpdapte connection where all values are stored in external property file.
